channel.title: The Closest to "Actual RuneScape" Client?
channel.description:
Alright, so would anybody happen to know of a client in the Downloads section, or that could upload a client somewhere, that is close, or right on, with RuneScape's gameframe (back in 317 times)? I am putting together my own web client, and no, I'm not asking for help with that as I know how to do that. I just feel, since I'm looking for this client, it'd be much quicker to ask than go through hundreds of "MY NEW GAMEFRAME ROX SOX!" Server Downloads posts.
I'm sick of all of these clients that I download with recolored items or horribly constructed new gameframes.
Thanks, Slave Scyth

item.title: The Closest to "Actual RuneScape" Client?
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

If you would like a clean renamed client, here is the link:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/downloads/srcAllDummysRemoved.tar.gz
